lexUnit.name: drown.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to kill by forcing underwater until death occurs

sentence.text: As in example , the Theban Crates flung all his possessions into the sea saying I had rather drown you than you should drown me .

I 'll just go and drown Zach ! "
